dict.description:`:js[command] <code>: Execut: description:`:js[command] <code>: Execute the given javascript <code> in a context where "this" points to a "${ns.name}" object.`
dict.description:`:jsfile <path> - Execute th: description:`:jsfile <path> - Execute the javascript code in the file at <path> (relative to the vault root; can be just the filename if it's unique). It can be any plain text file with arbitrary file extension. The code will be evaluated in a context where "this" points to a "${ns.name}" object.`
dict.description:\":obcommand <command-id> -: description:":obcommand <command-id> - Execute the Obsidian command with the specified ID. Inspired by esm's awesome Vimrc Support plugin."

dict..setDesc(\"You can choose a color from t: .setDesc("You can choose a color from the color picker or select one from your custom named colors.")
dict..setDesc(\"This PDF document does not ha: .setDesc("This PDF document does not have any page labels.")
dict..setDesc(\"The index of the first page i: .setDesc("The index of the first page in this range.")
dict..setDesc(\"The index of the last page in: .setDesc("The index of the last page in this range.")
dict..setDesc('Type the path in the input box: .setDesc('Type the path in the input box or click the "Browse" button to select the file.')
dict..setDesc(`If you find PDF++ helpful, ple:
.setDesc(`If you find PDF++ helpful, please consider supporting the development to help me keep this plugin alive.

If you prefer PayPal, please make donations via Ko-fi. Thank you!`)
dict..setDesc(`Currently ${r?\"required\":\"n: .setDesc(`Currently ${r?"required":"not required"}. You can toggle this on and off in the core Page Preview plugin settings > ${i}.`)
dict..setDesc(\"It must contain at least one: .setDesc("It must contain at least one character in order to make annotations referenceable & editable within Obsidian.")
dict..setDesc('Annotate PDF files with highli: .setDesc('Annotate PDF files with highlights just by linking to text selection. You can easily copy links to selections using color palette in the toolbar. See the "Color palette" section for the details.')
dict..setDesc(\"In the PDF viewer, any refere: .setDesc("In the PDF viewer, any referenced text will be highlighted for easy identification.")
dict..setDesc(\"How backlinks to a text selec: .setDesc("How backlinks to a text selection should be visualized.")
dict..setDesc(`Easily open backlinks or displ: .setDesc(`Easily open backlinks or display a popover preview of it by pressing ${Bt("Mod").toLowerCase()} (by default) while hovering over a highlighted text in PDF viewer.`)
dict..setDesc(`If turned on, the ${this.plugi: .setDesc(`If turned on, the ${this.plugin.settings.paneTypeForFirstMDLeaf==="left-sidebar"?"left":"right"} sidebar will be used whether there is existing markdown tabs or not.`)
dict..setDesc(\"Turn this on if you want to o: .setDesc("Turn this on if you want to open markdown files in a single pane in the sidebar.")
dict..setDesc(\"If some notes are opened in t: .setDesc("If some notes are opened in the ignored splits, PDF++ will still open the backlink in the way specified in the previous setting. For example, you might want to ignore the left sidebar if you are pinning a certain note (e.g. daily note) in it.")
dict..setDesc(\"This option will be ignored w: .setDesc("This option will be ignored when you open a link in a tab in the same split as the current tab.")
dict..setDesc(\"By default, all backlinks are: .setDesc("By default, all backlinks are highlighted. If this option is enabled, a backlink will be highlighted only when a color is specified in the link text.")
dict..setDesc(\"If no color is specified in l: .setDesc("If no color is specified in link text, this color will be used.")
dict..setDesc(\"Bounding rectangles will be s: .setDesc("Bounding rectangles will be shown for annotations with backlinks.")
dict..setDesc(\"Show icons for text selection: .setDesc("Show icons for text selections, annotations, offsets and rectangular selections with backlinks.")
dict..setDesc(\"By default, rectangular selec: .setDesc("By default, rectangular selection embeds are re-rendered every time you open the markdown file, which can slow down the loading time. Turn on this option to replace them with static images and improve the performance.")
dict..setDesc('If enabled, rectangular select: .setDesc('If enabled, rectangular selection embeds will be inverted in color when the "Adapt to theme" setting is enabled in the PDF toolbar. This will help you reduce eye strain in dark mode.')
dict..setDesc(\"The higher the value, the bet: .setDesc("The higher the value, the better the rendering quality, but the longer time it takes to render. The default value is 100.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, the name of the: .setDesc("When enabled, the name of the color selected in the color palette will be included in the link text. As a result, the rectangular selection will be highlighted with the specified color in the PDF viewer.")
dict..setDesc(\"(Not supported on smartphones: .setDesc("(Not supported on smartphones) When enabled, the dropdown menus (\u2304) in the PDF toolbar will be opened by hovering over the icon, and you don't need to click it.")
dict..setDesc(\"A input box will be added to: .setDesc("A input box will be added to the PDF toolbar, which indicated the current zoom level and allows you to set the zoom level by typing a number.")
dict..setDesc('Clicking a color while selecti: .setDesc('Clicking a color while selecting a range of text will copy a link to the selection with "&color=..." appended.')
dict..setDesc(\"A color palette will be added: .setDesc("A color palette will be added to the toolbar of the PDF viewer.")
dict..setDesc(\"This color will be selected i: .setDesc("This color will be selected in the color palette in a newly opened PDF viewer.")
dict..setDesc(\"If disabled, you can specify: .setDesc("If disabled, you can specify a different color for each color palette.")
dict..setDesc(`When disabled${Jn.quietColorPa: .setDesc(`When disabled${Jn.quietColorPaletteTooltip?"":" (default)"}, the tooltip will show the color name as well as the selected copy format and display text format. If enabled, only the color name will be shown.`)
dict..setDesc(\"This option will be ignored i: .setDesc("This option will be ignored in PDF embeds.")
dict..setDesc(\"(Desktop & tablet only) Custo: .setDesc("(Desktop & tablet only) Customize the behavior of the context menu that pops up when you right-click in the PDF viewer. For mobile users, see also the next section.")
dict..setDesc('You can customize the display: .setDesc('You can customize the display text format in the setting "Copied text foramt > Display text format" below.')
dict..setDesc('\"Search on Google Scholar\":: .setDesc('"Search on Google Scholar": Available when right-clicking citation links in PDFs.')
dict..setDesc(\"Available when right-clicking: .setDesc("Available when right-clicking with no text selected.")
dict..setDesc(\"By turning this on, you can u: .setDesc("By turning this on, you can use the same hotkey to show the outline of a markdown file and a PDF file without key conflict.")
dict..setDesc(\"Enabling this will allow you: .setDesc("Enabling this will allow you to use the same hotkey to close the sidebar if it is already open.")
dict..setDesc(\"By turning this on, you can u: .setDesc("By turning this on, you can use the same hotkey to zoom in/out a PDF viewer or any other type of view without key conflict.")
dict..setDesc(\"The template format that will: .setDesc("The template format that will be used when copying a link to a selection or an annotation in PDF viewer. ")
dict..setDesc(\"If disabled, you can specify: .setDesc("If disabled, you can specify a different display text format for each PDF viewer from the dropdown menu in the PDF toolbar.")
.setDesc("If disabled, you can specify a different action for each PDF viewer from the dropdown menu in the PDF toolbar.")
dict..setDesc(\"For example, you can use this: .setDesc("For example, you can use this to copy a link to the page when there is no selection.")
dict..setDesc(\"Speed up the process of copyi: .setDesc("Speed up the process of copying & pasting PDF links to your notes with some automation. Note that you can't activate both of auto-focus and auto-paste at the same time.")
dict..setDesc(`If enabled, the \"Copy link to: .setDesc(`If enabled, the "Copy link to selection or annotation" command will be triggered automatically every time you select a range of text in a PDF viewer, meaning you don't even have to press a hotkey to copy a link.`)
dict..setDesc(\"You can also toggle auto-focu: .setDesc("You can also toggle auto-focus via an icon in the left ribbon menu if the next setting is enabled.")
dict..setDesc(\"You can also toggle this mode: .setDesc("You can also toggle this mode via a command. Reload the plugin after changing this setting to take effect.")
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, a markdown file w: .setDesc("If enabled, a markdown file will be focused automatically after copying a link to PDF text selection or annotation.")
dict..setDesc(\"Recommended if you prefer som: .setDesc("Recommended if you prefer something less agressive than auto-paste. You can also toggle auto-focus via an icon in the left ribbon menu if the next setting is enabled.")
dict..setDesc(\"You can also toggle auto-focu: .setDesc("You can also toggle auto-focus via a command. Reload the plugin after changing this setting to take effect.")
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, the copied link t: .setDesc("If enabled, the copied link to PDF text selection or annotation will be automatically pasted into a markdown file right after copying.")
dict..setDesc(\"You can also toggle auto-past: .setDesc("You can also toggle auto-paste via an icon in the left ribbon menu if the next setting is enabled.")
.setDesc("You can also toggle auto-paste via a command. Reload the plugin after changing this setting to take effect.")
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, auto-paste will f: .setDesc("If enabled, auto-paste will focus on the editor after pasting.")
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, the text selectio: .setDesc("If enabled, the text selection in the PDF viewer will be automatically cleared after performing auto-pasting.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, triggering auto: .setDesc("When enabled, triggering auto-pasting will paste the copied text at the current cursor position if the target note is already opened. If disabled, the text will be always appended to the end of the note.")
dict..setDesc(\"Because you disabled the opti: .setDesc("Because you disabled the option above, auto-pasted content will be added at the end of your note. Enable this option to make sure that you have a blank line between the existing content and the newly added content.")
dict..setDesc(\"General settings that apply t: .setDesc("General settings that apply to both auto-focus and auto-paste.")
dict..setDesc(\"This option will not affect t: .setDesc("This option will not affect the behavior of Hover Editor outside of PDF++.")
dict..setDesc(\"After auto-pasting into a mar: .setDesc("After auto-pasting into a markdown file opened in the left or right sidebar, the sidebar will be automatically collapsed once it loses focus.")
dict..setDesc('This option can be useful espe: .setDesc('This option can be useful especially when you set the previous option to "Hover Editor".')
dict..setDesc(\"When PDF++ cannot determine w: .setDesc("When PDF++ cannot determine which markdown file to focus on or paste to, it will execute the command specified in the next option to let you pick a target file.")
dict..setDesc(\"The link will be auto-pasted: .setDesc("The link will be auto-pasted into the first markdown file that you open within this time frame after the command is executed. If you don't open any markdown file during this time, the auto-paste will not occur. This option is not related to auto-focus.")
dict..setDesc('Creates a new note and opens i: .setDesc('Creates a new note and opens it in a new pane specified in the "How to open target markdown file when not opened" option.')
dict..setDesc(\"Note that turning on this opt: .setDesc("Note that turning on this option disables text selection in the annotation popup (e.g. modified date, author, etc).")
dict..setDesc(\"This is the same behavior as: .setDesc("This is the same behavior as the PDF viewers of some web browsers (e.g. Chrome/Firefox). You may have to reopen the PDF file after changing this option.")
dict..setDesc(\"You can turn this on and off: .setDesc("You can turn this on and off with the toggle button in the PDF viewer toolbar.")
dict..setDesc(\"If disabled, you can specify: .setDesc("If disabled, you can specify whether to write highlights to files for each PDF viewer.")
dict..setDesc('If enabled, you can edit the t: .setDesc('If enabled, you can edit the text contents of annotations embedded in PDF files by clicking the "Edit" button in the annotation popup.')
dict..setDesc('If enabled, you can delete ann: .setDesc('If enabled, you can delete annotations embedded in PDF files by clicking the "Delete" button in the annotation popup.')
dict..setDesc(\"Make it easier to work with i: .setDesc("Make it easier to work with internal links embedded in PDF files.")
dict..setDesc(`You may want to turn this off: .setDesc(`You may want to turn this off to avoid conflicts with hover+${_n}.`)
dict..setDesc('When enabled, clicking the \"n: .setDesc('When enabled, clicking the "navigate back" (left arrow) button will take you back to the page you were originally viewing before clicking on an internal link in the PDF file.')
dict..setDesc(\"Running this command while vi: .setDesc("Running this command while viewing a PDF file will copy a link, clicking which will open the PDF file at the current scroll position and zoom level.")
dict..setDesc('(Requires custom context menu: .setDesc('(Requires custom context menu & PDF editing enabled) After copying a link by the above actions, you can "paste" it to a selection in PDF to create a PDF internal link. To do this, right-click the selection and click "Paste copied link to selection".')
dict..setDesc('Specify whether PDF internal l: .setDesc('Specify whether PDF internal links that you create by "Paste copied link to selection" should be surrounded by borders.')
dict..setDesc('Specify the border color of PD: .setDesc('Specify the border color of PDF internal links that you create by "Paste copied link to selection".')
dict..setDesc(\"Make it easier to work with e: .setDesc("Make it easier to work with external links embedded in PDF files.")
dict..setDesc(\"General settings for the PDF: .setDesc("General settings for the PDF sidebar. The options specific to the outline and thumbnails are located in the corresponding sections below.")
dict..setDesc(\"Requires reopening the tabs a: .setDesc("Requires reopening the tabs after changing this option.")
dict..setDesc('Power up the outline view of t: .setDesc('Power up the outline view of the built-in PDF viewer: add, rename, or delete items via the right-click menu and the "Add to outline" command, drag & drop items to insert a section link, and more.')
dict..setDesc(\"Reopen tabs or reload the app: .setDesc("Reopen tabs or reload the app after changing this option.")
dict..setDesc(\"This enables you to insert a: .setDesc("This enables you to insert a section link with a custom format by right-clicking an item in the outline. Moreover, you will be able to add, rename, or delete outline items if PDF modification is enabled.")
dict..setDesc(\"Grab an item in the outline a: .setDesc("Grab an item in the outline and drop it to a markdown file to insert a section link. Changing this option requires reopening the tabs or reloading the app.")
dict..setDesc('You can copy PDF outline as a: .setDesc('You can copy PDF outline as a markdown list or headings using the commands "Copy outline as markdown list" and "Copy outline as markdown headings".')
dict..setDesc(\"You don't need to include lea: .setDesc("You don't need to include leading hyphens in the template.")
.setDesc("You don't need to include leading hashes in the template.")
dict..setDesc(\"The copied headings will star: .setDesc("The copied headings will start at this level.")
dict..setDesc(`You may want to turn this off: .setDesc(`You may want to turn this off to avoid conflicts with hover+${_n}`)
dict..setDesc(\"This enables you to copy a pa: .setDesc("This enables you to copy a page link with a custom display text format specified in the PDF toolbar by right-clicking a thumbnail. Moreover, you will be able to insert, delete, extract pages if PDF modification is enabled.")
dict..setDesc('If enabled, the newly created: .setDesc('If enabled, the newly created PDF file will be opened after running the commands "Extract this page to a new file" or "Divide this PDF into two files at this page".')
dict..setDesc('Applies to the commands \"Inse: .setDesc('Applies to the commands "Insert page before/after this page".')
dict..setDesc('Applies to the commands \"Extr: .setDesc('Applies to the commands "Extract this page to a new file" and "Divide this PDF into two files at this page".')
dict..setDesc(\"This option will be ignored w: .setDesc("This option will be ignored when you open a PDF link in a tab in the same split as the PDF viewer.")
dict..setDesc(\"When you open a link to a PDF: .setDesc("When you open a link to a PDF file that's already opened, Obsidian's default behavior causes the zoom level to be reset to fit the width of the PDF file to the viewer. If enabled, the current zoom level will be preserved. This option will be ignored in PDF embeds.")
dict..setDesc(`Press ${Bt(\"Mod\").toLowerCas: .setDesc(`Press ${Bt("Mod").toLowerCase()} while hovering a PDF link to actually open it if the target PDF is already opened in another tab.`)
dict..setDesc('Obsidian lets you specify the: .setDesc('Obsidian lets you specify the height of a PDF embed by appending "&height=..." to a link, and this also applies to popover previews. Enable this option if you want to ignore the height parameter in popover previews.')
dict..setDesc(\"Double-clicking a PDF embed w: .setDesc("Double-clicking a PDF embed will open the embedded file.")
dict..setDesc('Regardless of the \"two page\": .setDesc('Regardless of the "two page" layout setting in existing PDF viewer, PDF embeds and PDF popover previews will be always displayed in "single page" layout. You can still turn it on for each embed by clicking the "two page" button in the toolbar, if shown.')
dict..setDesc(\"After changing this option, y: .setDesc("After changing this option, you need to reopen tabs or reload the app.")
dict..setDesc('You can toggle this on and off: .setDesc('You can toggle this on and off with the "Show only backlinks in the current page" button at the top right of the backlinks pane.')
dict..setDesc(\"If turned off, only backlinks: .setDesc("If turned off, only backlinks to specific text selections, annotations or locations will be shown when filtering the backlinks page by page.")
dict..setDesc(\"Hovering your mouse over high: .setDesc("Hovering your mouse over highlighted text or annotation will also highlight the corresponding item in the backlink pane.")
dict..setDesc(\"In the backlinks pane, hover: .setDesc("In the backlinks pane, hover your mouse over an backlink item to highlight the corresponding text or annotation in the PDF viewer. This option requires reopening or switching tabs to take effect.")
dict..setDesc('To add a new color, click the: .setDesc('To add a new color, click the "+" button in the "highlight colors" setting above.')
dict..setDesc(\"Open PDF links with the OS-de: .setDesc("Open PDF links with the OS-defined default application for PDF files.")
dict..setDesc(\"Open the same PDF file both i: .setDesc("Open the same PDF file both in the default app and Obsidian at the same time.")
dict..setDesc(\"When you focus on a PDF file: .setDesc("When you focus on a PDF file in Obsidian, the external app will also focus on the same file.")
dict..setDesc(\"Otherwise, the focus will be: .setDesc("Otherwise, the focus will be moved to the external app.")
dict..setDesc(`Where newly created dummy PDF: .setDesc(`Where newly created dummy PDF files are placed. If set to "${Ow.obsidian}", dummy files will be saved in the folder specified in Obsidian settings > Files and links > Default location for new attachments.`)
dict..setDesc(\"Place newly created dummy PDF: .setDesc("Place newly created dummy PDF files in this folder.")
dict..setDesc('If your file is under \"vault/: .setDesc('If your file is under "vault/folder", and you set subfolder name to "attachments", dummy PDF files will be saved to "vault/folder/attachments".')
dict..setDesc(\"Specify the URI pattens for P: .setDesc("Specify the URI pattens for PDFs in regular expressions. When dragging and dropping a URI/URL from your browser to Obsidian's editor, it will be used to check if the destination file is a PDF file. If you need multiple patterns, separate them with a new line.")
dict..setDesc(\"Reopen the PDF viewers after: .setDesc("Reopen the PDF viewers after changing this option.")
dict..setDesc(`They are used preferentially f: .setDesc(`They are used preferentially from left to right, so you might want to put the easier-to-reach keys first. This is the same as Tridactyl's "hintchars" option.`)
dict..setDesc('Space-separated list of \"link: .setDesc('Space-separated list of "link"/"annot"/"backlink" or "all". Run ":help :hint" for the details.')
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, you can use j/k/h: .setDesc("If enabled, you can use j/k/h/l keys, instead of the arrow keys, to navigate through context menu items in the PDF viewer.")
dict..setDesc(\"The size of scroll when one o: .setDesc("The size of scroll when one of the jkhl keys is pressed once.")
dict..setDesc(\"The speed of scroll when pres: .setDesc("The speed of scroll when pressing and holding down the jkhl keys.")
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, all matches will: .setDesc("If enabled, all matches will be highlighted.")
dict..setDesc(\"Incremental search: while typ: .setDesc("Incremental search: while typing the search query, update the search results after every keystroke. If disabled, the results will be shown only after pressing Enter.")
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, PDF++ will automa: .setDesc("If enabled, PDF++ will automatically check for updates every 24 hours and notify you if a new version is available.")
dict..setDesc('For example, when you copy a l: .setDesc('For example, when you copy a link to a text selection in a PDF file, the status "Link copied" will be displayed in the PDF toolbar.')
dict..setDesc('The \"Create new PDF\" command: .setDesc('The "Create new PDF" command will create a new PDF file in the location specified here.')
dict..setDesc(\"Newly created PDFs will appea: .setDesc("Newly created PDFs will appear under this folder.")
dict..setDesc(\"Such whitespace can be introd: .setDesc("Such whitespace can be introduced as a result of poor post-processing of OCR (optical character recognition). Enable this option to remove it when copying links to text selections.")
dict..setDesc('Provide the \"PATH\" environme: .setDesc('Provide the "PATH" environment variable for PDF++ to run shell commands without the full paths specified. In MacOS and Linux, you can run "echo $PATH" in Terminal and then copy & paste the result here. Currently, it will be used only when you run ":!<command>" in Vim mode.')
dict..setDesc(\"You can find more options in: .setDesc("You can find more options in Style Settings > PDF++.")
